Data Description: Airbnb's unique identifier for the listing.
URL to the listing page on Airbnb.
Name of the listing.
Detailed description of the listing.
Host's description of the neighborhood.
URL to the Airbnb-hosted image for the listing.
Uses the World Geodetic System (WGS84) projection for latitude.
Uses the World Geodetic System (WGS84) projection for longitude.
The type of property listed on Airbnb, selected by the host.
The maximum capacity of the listing (number of guests).
The number of bathrooms in the listing.
Textual description of the number of bathrooms.
The number of bedrooms in the listing.
The number of beds in the listing.
JSON field containing a list of amenities available in the listing.
Daily price in local currency.
The total number of reviews the listing has received.
The number of reviews the listing has received in last 12 months.
The number of reviews the listing has received in last 30 days.
The overall rating of the listing based on guest reviews.
Rating based on how accurate the listing description is.
Rating based on the cleanliness of the listing.
Rating based on ease of check-in.
Rating based on host communication.
Rating based on the location of the listing.
Rating based on the value for money of the listing.
Whether the guest can book instantly without host approval (t=true, f=false).
The average number of reviews per month the listing has received.
The City where the property located.
Contains the different view for an property in the text somewhere
